articles.title: Asia Cup 2022 Top Fails: Rishabh Pant to Avesh Khan, top 5 players who could be dropped from Team India - In Pics - Zee News
articles.description: In this collection of photos, we will take you through the top five biggest fails from Team India in Asia Cup 2022.
articles.content: In three matches, Deepak Hooda got to bat in two innings where he could just score 19 runs. Team India will want to rethink using him as a finisher.
